description: Jelly crimps might sound tasty, but don't eat them. Instead, use them to make quick, weatherproof connections on low-voltage wiring. Here's how.

description: Multiple reports of malfunctioning cameras and a surprisingly simple solution point to a widespread issue on Microsoft's part.

title: TikTok CEO updates on Project Texas, says US user data will be in Oracle's hands soon
